p: From Figure 7 we can observe that if coefficients tend to zero for the ecosystem model (which comprises Mediterranean bush, arable land, or pasture), it is possible to identify which variables depend significantly on land type where genotypes developed ( Figure 5). In this case, some terpenes in essential oils play a role.
